p: In addition to the control, without the addition of elicitors, the effect of elicitors salicylic acid at 28 mg/L, added to the medium and cold sterilized with the aid of a 22 µm Millipore filter [ 13], and chitosan at 50 mg/L, added to the culture medium after autoclaving was verified. The chitosan solution was prepared by dissolution in 1 mL of glacial acetic acid at 55–60 °C for 15 min, and then the final volume was completed to 10 mL with distilled water and the pH adjusted to 5.8 with NaOH before its addition to the culture medium [ 14].
